item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

Thank you for all the volunteers helping the Project Doggy. You guys are doing a great job in the team. I want to recruit more people to help you with the activities.

Current Project Doggy Volunteers: Please plan to attend this meeting if you can. Just to keep track of our progress and achievements.

Prospective Volunteers: We are still recruiting volunteers for the following positions

  1. Offline Campaign and Public Relations
  2. Social Networking and publicity
  3. Community outreach
  4. Event Organizers
  5. Volunteer co-ordinators
  6. Accounting
  7. Active Volunteers or pet lovers

Learn more about this project: www.doggyfunrun.org

If you interested to volunteer or give some ideas or support the project, please join us at

Democracy Center, Main entrance door code: 653

Address: 45 Mt Auburn Street, Cambridge, MA 02138 at 2 00 PM. (Please call me at 505-301-6872 if you are lost or need additional info)

Lets go dinner after the meeting.

Thank you and see you soon.

Phani

The Boston Volunteers
Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Project Doggy Organizers/volunteers Meet
